name: Entity Update Tracking
description: Servers MUST track entity field updates during mutation execution and include modified entities in the cascade response

input.mutation: mutation UpdateUser($id: ID!, $input: UpdateUserInput!) { updateUser(id: $id, input: $input) { id name email } }

context.schema: type Mutation { updateUser(id: ID!, input: UpdateUserInput!): User } type User { id: ID! name: String! email: String! } input UpdateUserInput { name: String email: String }
